articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israel expanded evacuation orders in Khan Younis in the southern Gaza Strip overnight, forcing tens of thousands of Palestinian residents and displaced families to leave in the dark as explosions from tank shelling reverberated around them.
articles.title: Israel orders more Gaza evacuations after school shelter attack kills scores

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Moscow's forces are in their sixth day of intense battles against Kyiv's largest incursion into Russian territory since Russia launched a full-scale invasion of Ukraine.
articles.title: Downed Ukraine-launched missile injures 13 in Russia's Kursk, regional officials say

articles.author: Angelos Tsatsis, Karolina Tagaris
articles.description: Several other regions across Greece were on high alert for fire risk.
articles.title: Residents flee as wildfire rages uncontrolled near Athens

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The death toll from a landslide at a vast garbage dump in Uganda's capital Kampala has risen to 13, police said on Sunday, as rescue personnel continued to dig for survivors.
articles.title: Death toll from landslide at Uganda garbage dump rises to 13

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Palestinian militant group Hamas on Sunday asked mediators to present a plan based upon previous talks instead of engaging in new negotiations for a Gaza ceasefire deal.
articles.title: Hamas wants Gaza mediation based on past talks

articles.author: Jessie Pang
articles.description: Hong Kong's top court on Monday unanimously dismissed the bid to overturn the convictions of media tycoon Jimmy Lai and six other pro-democracy campaigners for an unauthorised assembly in 2019.
articles.title: Hong Kong court dismisses bid by media tycoon Jimmy Lai to overturn conviction

articles.author: Idrees Ali, Phil Stewart
articles.description: U.S. Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin has ordered the deployment of a guided missile submarine to the Middle East, the Pentagon said on Sunday, as the region braces for possible attacks by Iran and its allies after the killing of senior members of Hamas and Hezbollah.
articles.title: US publicly announces submarine move to Middle East amid Israel-Iran tensions

articles.author: Michel Rose, Elizabeth Pineau
articles.description: The Paris Olympics delivered a dazzling summertime success that charmed the world and reaffirmed French national pride. The hangover will be tough.
articles.title: France's 'beautiful dream' fades as Games give way to political crisis

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Russia on Monday evacuated parts of another region next to Ukraine after Kyiv sharply increased military activity near the border just days after its biggest incursion into sovereign Russian territory since the start of the 2022 war.
articles.title: Russia evacuates another border region amid growing threat from Ukrainian units

articles.author: Philbert Girinema
articles.description: His reputation has been sullied by allegations of rights abuses and suppression of dissent.
articles.title: Rwanda's President Kagame sworn into office
